name: Brenda Wallace
text: Kids enjoyed the music, the playground tunnels area, has a small area for birthday parties for kids , food ok not too many choices but definitely  could use an upgrade on the games the machines dont work half of the time and there is no refunds

name: Barbara Dillard
text: Let me start off by saying that I never get out because of my disabilities. But the one time I went out my experience here was outstanding. Two part time workers, Nick and Courtney went above and beyond to help me with my accommodations. They greeted me with a warm smile and answered all my questions. They listened to my old stories and I felt like they were my grandchildren at one point. These young fine adults are what makes the young generation great. Outstanding service. Thank you so much for helping me make memories with my grandkids.

name: Heather Ryals
text: Never answers the phone and is not open when they say they are.

name: Haiden Christian Caraway
text: It was amazing. I loved it. 10 stars if could.

name: Kat Priddy
text: Had my daughters birthday party here. She loved it! The party area was clean and the cost to rent it was very affordable. Overall  great birthday party!

name: scott ward
text: Enjoyed the day with the family here and priced Right and good fun.

name: Christy Larkin
text: Good fun at a great price for kids.  Great for birthday parties!

name: bonnie nye
text: Attended a BIRTHDAY party, Enjoyed it

name: Oree Tanking
text: Basic wooden skating rink.

name: Yes Yes
text: Signs and Facebook page says they are open 6:30 to 10. But it isnt open. Such liars.

name: Maranda&Paul Godwin
text: Needs some upgrading an maintenance. The only place that Moulton has for real for the young people so maybe they can get some type of assistance in the near future. With the way the world is today it would be nice for the youth to have a safe nice place to congergate...

name: gamer boy 5267
text: Was a great time come on out enjoy it with us

name: Sanbow lettson Jones
text: Ok

name: Kimbone Spanky
text: Very well priced! Good bang for your buck and the food is reasonably priced. Something for all ages which is very important in our family of 5. The staff is very nice also. Only bad thing is... I almost killed myself on the bunched up carpet in front of the food area! Lol

name: Yelonda Nance
text: Had an amazing time for Makenslee 3birthday

resp.text: We're glad things went well. Thanks for having your party with us!

name: Annie4lorida
text: This place was a super fun outing for a very mixed age group of cousins (8 years old to 22) and one middle aged mama. :) We took advantage of the family/holiday special which was 5 admissions for laser tag and skating, a pizza and 5 cokes for just $20.00! I was  pleasantly surprised at the quality of the attraction (guess I was expecting less because of the low price). The staff was friendly and helpful, everything was clean, the full size skating rink had some fun, colored lighting, and the laser tag was glitch free.  (We did pay extra because the kids wanted a second game of laser tag, a second pizza,and “race” skates instead of regular but I didn’t mind paying for the extra stuff since the initial admission was so cheap.) We will definitely come here again when visiting family in north Alabama.  (They do not take debit or credit cards, which I didn’t see advertised anywhere, so be prepared for that.)

name: Thandiwe Gooden
text: There is something for all ages at this skate center: arcade, jungle gym, skating, laser tag.  It's a mainstay during the winter months.  My kids 4 to 10 love it.  The owner/operators are great people and the environment is kid and parent friendly.  Music is good and facilities are well kept.  I have nothing negative to say about this place.

name: Will Payne
text: We had a bday party here for my son. Clean and the party room was set up well. Good service. Very friendly staff, especially the woman who we dealt with, Jamie Lee.  Fair price for the party. My only complaint is that it was kind of hot inside. They did not have the a/c on, but we're using lots if ceiling fans instead. Overall, would certainly recommend this skate center.

name: John Adams
text: We've been twice. Once in August and it was REALLY hot inside. Now in January and it was REALLY cold inside. Seems like they have no heat or AC. The rink is fine, the play area is fun, the food is concession stand quality...it's fine but don't expect something nice.

name: Meesha Telvanni
text: Safe, family friendly place. Kids gave lots of fun. Makes me wish for adults only skating, so we can relive our younger days with music from the past!

name: J Talley
text: Had kids birthday party there. The overall place is good, they do need to get a few machines fixed.

name: Randall Cartner
text:
Easy, family fun...but Needs:
Novice skating walkers for safety, improved building cosmetics (trees, shrubs, signs, paint).
Expand with well thought-out outdoor fun like batting cages, putt putt golf, paint ball range, splash pad, etc.

name: Stephanie Roney
text: Been coming here for my son's birthday parties for 5 years and this is the best place in town by far! They are well priced and so much more to do than a jump place or other skating rings this one is one of a kind and we will keep coming back every year

name: Andrew Kennamer
text: The skate rink had a nice build, they have a decent amount of variety as far as different things you can do. The selection includes a mini arcade as well as laser tag, and of course skating. Getting to why this place only received 3 stars from me, mostly the atmosphere. I've been on quite a few occasions and on more than one trip there are foul mouth teenagers that you most likely wouldn't want near your family. Although that isn't a very frequent problem as I have seen the management try to get a customer to discontinue their loud usage of the profane word selection. But as an over all rating I feel that roller coasters gets a 6/10. If you were to include price as a factor in your selection it may jump to a 7/10 due to the very low entry fee. As always the price is subject to change but for every time I've went the price to get in has been at most $5, which comparatively is a great deal.

name: NICOLE DUNN
text: Great safe place to take your kids to skate. They don't take debit cards so it's cash or check only. No they don't have an atm either so be prepared for that. There is also a great playground inside for kids who aren't ready to skate or who need a break.also games and good food.

name: Amy Yates
text: HOT. Not in a good way. When you take kids skating to beat the summer heat and it's 80°+ inside. Everyone in our party was dripping with sweat and the kids wanted to leave early. Went to get $2 drinks and they were out of most all fountain drinks as well as hot dogs. I'd like to say it's because it's 95° outside, but the building never cooled in the 3-1/2 hours we were there. Same thing the last time we visited in the spring. Won't be back.

name: D. Schmachtenberger
text: This seems like a really nice and clean business.  Although you can't make everyone happy.  The music is a lot of rap stuff, not my thing......and if you leave your drink on your table even if all your personal stuff is still there and get up to go skate they will throw it away which I didn't like.  You can't finish a huge drink in one sitting. But it did get us to buy drinks over and over.... that's not cool.

name: Ginger Shaneyfelt
text: Great place to go for the kids and whole family to have fun!

name: Gladys Williams
text: Mike and Beverly are absolutely wonderful. Our kids love all the options to play they have there. :-)

name: Adam Kohn
text: Its a really good place and its really good priced i really recommend this place

name: Kevin Harshaw
text: My kids love the place. It's safe and MCSO provides the security

name: Gladys Williams
text: Mike and Beverly are absolutely wonderful. Our kids love all the options to play they have there. :-)

name: Mindy Kimbrough
text: I love going there u can play Lazer tag I love it and the people there r very nice

name: D. Schmachtenberger
text: This seems like a really nice and clean business.  Although you can't make everyone happy.  The music is a lot of rap stuff, not my thing......and if you leave your drink on your table even if all your personal stuff is still there and get up to go skate they will throw it away which I didn't like.  You can't finish a huge drink in one sitting. But it did get us to buy drinks over and over.... that's not cool.

name: Emily Katherine Mullins
text: Oh I go every weekend with all my friends everyone is so nice their!

name: Sierra Forsythe
text: I love coasters I try to go every Friday and late night skates Rock.

name: Erika Smithey
text: The owners are very RUDE!!!!! My children will never be back and the police they have there is not professional.

name: Daniel Sievers
text: I like the roller skating rink. I like the play place and the laser tag.

resp.text: Thanks Daniel!

name: Brandie Williams
text: I am vary disappointed because of all the profanity coming from the children that were here also.Two young kids almost got in to a fight.i thought that this was a family establishment,  i do not raise my kids like that and i most certain do not want them to be exposed to it. Even my 16 year old was asking me can we leave we were only here for 45 min we will not be back because of this.

name: kalla Trammell
text: it is ok

name: Ari's Channel (Arie-Bugg)

name: ポパーブルーベリー
text: Broke my wrist

name: Brian Rodgers
text: Thursday night family night. $20 includes: skate rentals, pizza, four drinks, and lazer tag for the family.

name: Skate Pros
text: This place is good i go evey Friday

name: Dominic Johnson
text: Well kept and fun

name: COOLNATHAN0325 Meeks

name: Gary Pearcy
text: Great entertainment, prices and snacks best deal in town. Skate, play golf,games.. Just a good family place!!

name: Charlene DeBusk
text: Wonderful place for our kids to be in a Christian environment.

name: Chewy Mustard
text:
Its a really cool place and fun to hang out with friends they have arcade games 🕹 and a basketball game that you can play with friends

There's a claw machine stacker racing game and air hockey

Putt putt golf and mini golf

Not to mention how fun skating is

And Jennifer is so sweet

Would recommend

name: Derrus Powe
text: Twin River Roller Rink has amazing workers very generous and great food. The atmosphere is always fun and very enjoyable for all kids. I would really recommend this roller rink if there any parties or just to go have fun.

name: Todd McHaney
text: Great place to take kids

name: Courtney Clanton
text: Very nice facility. We had a party of about 13 kids. They are reasonable. There is also a area to play golf inside and outside as well as a few arcade games.

name: eddie foster
text: Great place for fun

name: Heather Flowers
text: My Granddaughter had her birthday party there and she had a great time.....

name: Larry Harkless Sr
text: Very good, need more games.

name: Jennifer Toliver
text: Had a blast. Will go back again

name: Dixie Bishop
text: Kids had a blast

name: Troy Sutton
text: Great place for the kids to go roller skating!

name: Carla Darrington
text: Fun for kids

name: Carla Gwin
text: Nice for a small town rink.

name: Mark Falso
text: Mason Harrington who posted saying about a lie.  It is not a lie, it is Google failing to add a category calling it, "Roller Skating Rink"  Instead, Google thinks every rink is an ice rink which is NOT true.  I am trying to get Google to add Roller Rink or Roller Skating Rink as a category.  Seemsly many things, Google, Facebook, etc are calling all rinks, ice rink which is not true.  I said that again to make sure you read this right.  Bango's was a roller rink but sources out there are saying they closed in July 2019 for good but I could not confirm.  Please contact Bango's for their avavilbity and opening due to COVID, new schedule and if they are still open.  It was Skate World before that. I am Roller Rink Historian with Dead-Rinks.

name: Mason Harrington
text: They said it's a ice skating rink online but it's not they lied

name: Ethan flips
text: Could yall open up un tell yall sell the place because I'm tired of not being able to hang out with my friends and I can't skate at my house so can yall please open

name: Harry Jones
text: Really enjoy taking my grandkids. Love the family atmosphere. Grandkids always look forward to going there when they visit.

name: Marissa Armstrong
text: Its really fun me and my friends go here all the time

text: Its good for about everything. The only complaint is the DJ. Whoever it is, is straight trash. But they dont play with th3 drinks either, you ask for a medium and get a medium large. Filling it to the BRIM. I had fun and can see myself going back. Would reccomend.

text: Nice place to bring our kids to play and have a fun times and great for birthday parties

name: cindy blevins

text: Need some serious updating, to the owner some paint and carpeting would do wonders, also a website wouldn't hurt

name: susan whitaker
text: Hey parents out there skateland is a good experience for you and your family to do together.

name: Ethan Fretwell
text: Lit

name: ivy ellen

name: Henry Martinez

name: Mandy Hall
text: Needs a deep cleaning.

name: Alice Gober
text: Kiddos loved the birthday party they attended there. Everything clean & we'll maintained. Staff super friendly. Great time was had by all.

name: Life Life
text: Love this place very fun for kids and/or adults

name: rb S
text: Love this spot! Great for parties or just a fun spot to skate, play some games and eat some tasty food. Really knowledgeable staff and they even have some skates for sale!

name: Charles Williams Jr.
text: Wouldve gave a 5 star.. ladies and staff was very nice... but some of the bigger kids wasnt following rules.. but they did keep control and threatened to dismiss the ones that were doing the most.. we will definitely be back

name: Gwynne Mountz
text: Great family owned skating rink! We just had my daughter's 8th birthday party there and it was the simplest, most maintenance free birthday ever!  Sherry and her daughter Breanna are so nice. They treat all of their customers like family! We really enjoyed our time here. I really liked how clean the place was too! You should definitely check them out! We can't wait to go back!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are glad you all had a great time!! Thank you for the sweet rating! Hope to see you all soon!

name: Lawanda Walker
text: Nice rink for kids. Wished they'd have adult night sometimes.

name: RaNetta Underwood
text: Our favorite birthday/family fun spot... Staff is always so helpful and friendly... If you're looking for somewhere to be safe but still have fun, especially during this pandemic, this is the place to go. We'll definitely be back!

name: Madison Harris
text: The place is very clean I go there frequently I I definitely have fun skating and watch soul skaters do they thing but I do wish that there were some better music instead of using old songs most of the time but they definitely put some Beyoncé

name: Gwynne Mountz
text: Great family owned skating rink! We just had my daughter's 8th birthday party there and it was the simplest, most maintenance free birthday ever!  Sherry and her daughter Breanna are so nice. They treat all of their customers like family! We really enjoyed our time here. I really liked how clean the place was too! You should definitely check them out! We can't wait to go back!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are glad you all had a great time!! Thank you for the sweet rating! Hope to see you all soon!

name: DatGurl Mesha
text: Great friendly atmosphere love this place.

name: Gavin Pennington
text: It was a great few hours Tuesdays are cheap and especially for my first time skating it was really fun and we had a great night

name: AvoidBlohsh
text: had tons of fun!

name: doc lamb
text: Great fun place.

name: adalyn elizabeth
text: I got to buy a Walker, socks, and Rent Roller skates. It was an awesome night, I just wish that I got to stay longer!

name: Bill Levey
text: Or girls loved this place! Affordable, clean and safe, and the staff was courteous and professional. We'll be back!

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed yourselves. Come back soon!

name: Justin Waller
text: I enjoy Roller Motion every time  when I go to the rink and enjoy skating every time. Sherry and  Breanna I adore and love both them. They r sweetest ladies that I have known close to 3 years this upcoming January of next year.

resp.text: We love you too Justin!

name: Shockwav
text: I can't skate but I had a wonderful time!

name: Bill Levey
text: Or girls loved this place! Affordable, clean and safe, and the staff was courteous and professional. We'll be back!

name: Brian Owens
text: terrible services i will not be coming back

name: Erica Gibson
text: Only thing I dislike corn dogs were put in microwave and the young ladies didn’t were food handing 🧤 😟

name: Mary Jones
text: Very fun for kids

name: J T N
text: Great floor but there was a lot of kids there to dodge and weave lol. Had a great time, will come back sometime.

name: JoAnna R
text: Great place. The people are very nice and the music is perfect!

name: Brandi Westrom
text: I love bringing my kids here!  The staff are friendly and the prices are good.  We can all have a good time and burn some energy.

name: Vicky Bolling
text: I have had good times in the past at this place. However. The owner's daughter pinched my grandson. We filed a police report  but nothing was done.  It's a clean place and children have fun. But you better keep a close eye on your children  keep them right by your side.

name: Tina Molette
text: My sister rented this facility out for my niece's birthday party. What made this skating rink stand out was it the building itself, it was the people who work there. They were courteous, professional, and made sure that we had a great time.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! Come back and see us again soon!

name: Jaheim Galimore
text: It’s a nice place in when I was there for a long time one of the workers said I can get 3 pizzas for 2$ in 1 pizza coast 2

name: Brian Brazil
text: Very nice staff and very clean fun filled family environment. Birthday parties are very easy thanks to the staff.

name: Brooke Smith
text: We had a great time!  Clean and family friendly environment.

name: Jerri Marie Vice
text: My kid loves this place

name: Starletta Davis
text: It was fun until the police officer came up to me and my friend and told us not to hold hands it was making people uncomfortable

name: Jaidenn
text: It was the best time ever had a great time wit my friends and I hope everybody can go there

name: The Overstreet’s
text: Had our girls a private party this past weekend. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. All of the kids and parents enjoyed it. I would recommend a private party, especially if you have smaller children. We all had a great time!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Glad you had a great time! Come back soon!

name: Jogging in the 80s
text: Great place for skating and employees are always friendly and make you feel at home but don't get too comfortable, watch after your belongings. Buy a locker if you have to. There are always opportunistic people looking to take what doesn't belong to them.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We try and monitor everything. We do have lockers to rent so your belongings will be safe.

name: Shannon Gamble
text: Great place to bring the kids for some fun

name: Serenity Letts
text: It's the best place to go when I'm with my friend and also we go like every weekend so....and there food and drinks r good

name: Charles Gooden
text: The worst skate Center ever, very races. The owner don’t like black and will tell you anything to get your money. I don’t recommend coming to this skating ring .

name: megan m pickering
text: Had my son's birthday party there. The kids loved it as did the parents. Super clean, great music, large skating area. We will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so glad you had a great time! Come back again soon!

name: Brandon Erwin
text: Place is awesome! Just like the skating rinks I grew up going to. Great people, great DJ, great atmosphere. Couldn't ask for a better experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! Come join us again soon!

name: Belinda Blackshear
text: Loved it, had not been SKATING in years, but getting back on track, and I will go back.

name: gameing Mania 2012
text: Friendly staff clean place. Kids had fun. Could stand to have more parking but all in all good place to have fun with the kids.

name: Sarah Speakman
text: My daughter goes every weekend. I drop her off with no worries because the staff does an amazing job at keeping the kids safe and secure. There's always an off duty police officer on site ensuring that the kids are safe and things do not get out of hand. The staffs main concern is that our children are safe when we put our trust in them to keep them that way. They do have a zero tolerance policy for the troublemakers that try to ruin it for those that are there to just have some fun. Children are not allowed to exit the premises without an adult waiting to pick them up. Great place for inexpensive bday parties too!

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful review! Safety is on of our main concerns!

name: Mario Bueno
text: The most wonderful birthday gift for my daughter. Both dad and daughter had a lot of fun for very inexpensive. The best 4 hours I've spent in a long time.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Glad you had a great time! Come back soon!

name: Tiffany Bennett
text: The lady at the front desk Ms. Sherry was rude!!!! She had a bad attitude. They way she talked to some of the kids was horrible!! Made up rules such as if you came in you had to pay. Why if your not skating? I have been there several times before and this was never one of the rules. If I go back Sunday, it won't be either. This rule was made up because it was mostly teens there and it is a way to make money. On the other hand the concession stand staff was awesome.

resp.text: We apologize for the inconvenience but our rule that has been in play for 23 years is that all children under 21 pay to enter, whether they are skating or not. It is posted in our lobby on the windows. We do not charge adults to come in and watch if they are not skating.

name: Gerald Hodges 3rd
text: This is a great place to take the children. Very family-friendly. Also a good place for birthdays.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Dee Gray
text: Always great when we go. Took my youngest son here today with his big bro,and he loved it. So much we booked party for him for his bday next month. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK GUYS ( BEEN CELEBRATING BDAYS HERE FOR OVER 17 YEARS FOR MY OTHER KIDS )

resp.text: Thank you so much for your amazing review! Glad you keep choosing us!

name: Desmon James
text: Great place to have fun with your family and have parties etc.

name: Joan Martin
text: Very clean and safe place to have fun.  We really enjoyed it

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We are glad you had a great time!

name: Lisa Peoples
text: It was awesome

name: Skyy Cummings
text: Had my son's birthday tonight and it was a very nice experience. Everybody enjoyed themselves.

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great time! Come back again soon and thank you for the review!

name: Crystal Davis
text: Luv yall best place to have a party

name: Cora Butler
text: Fun!! It's lots of people from many different backgrounds having fun. The building and location could be intimidating at first glance, but once you are inside, it's all good!  Parking is a nightmare when it is crowded, but other than that...FuN!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We are currently in the process of updating so stay posted for changes!

name: Antisocial Ryan
text: I had a pleasant experience there for a birthday party for several years.  The first year I reserved a room,  the second year I reserved the tables on the outside of a room, the third year I rented the skating rink for a party and had 50 guest.  Everyone had a blast and the staff and manager was very nice and kind.  I would recommend it to anyone who likes quality on a budget.

name: Graci Terry
text: It was so much fun. But the only thing I would change, would be better air conditioning.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We just had them checked this week and they are back up and going! Come back and join us again soon!

name: Danielle Bronsing
text: Really clean and well organized establishment. All the workers were polite. Only issue was the teenagers that thought they could go as fast as they could or skate backwards all while knocking kids and other skaters over without any apology.

name: John E.
text: This is my first one star review ever. I experienced what is quite possibly one of the rudest people I’ve ever met. The lady running the front window (possibly the owner?) embarrassed my daughter in front of her family and friends and made her cry. Look, if you have a general hatred for the human race, maybe choose a career other than owning a place where you have to interact with HUMANS. No one made you open a nasty old skating rink that hasn’t been updated (or cleaned very well) since the 80s. Maybe hire a younger, happier person to man the front counter?? It’s not that hard. You can continue hating people all you want back in your office.

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. We did not mean to upset your child in any way. We just have a dress code in play that must be followed.

name: Mystery
text: I have been to better roller skating places than this one....... Concessions are cheap, little games you play while you're skating. And they really could've had a better arcade.

name: Quentin Torrance
text: Omg had so much fun here with my friends 💯💯 Loved the old school hits too😂 definitely that six flags song.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We are so glad you had a great time!

name: Merisiel Moon
text: I love to skate I have a good time here just wish it was not so crowded.

name: DREW C
text: Security was great and they let me in on my good looks..lol joke between owner and myself ..but my experience was great for my grand kids..will be going back again

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great time! Thank you for the review and be sure to come back again soon, especially on your looks :)

name: nobody parker
text: I really enjoyed my visit to.ths place i havent went rollar skating in years at least 31 yrs it was so fun

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great time! Come back again soon!

name: Cristal Black
text: They were friendly and helpful this was my second time having a party at that location and I know it won't be my last

name: shernira walker
text: My Daughter love this place favorite hobby is skating.

resp.text: We are so glad she enjoys it! Come back soon!

name: Scott Klawitter
text: Fun environment for my younger kids, and brings me back a few years when I went skating. They provide great deals to the schools and kids for schools out skate. Make sure to bring cash here. They don't accept cards.

name: Gin Lee
text: Kids love. Large skating rink.

name: Tiana “Big Daddy Irv” Irvin
text: Good place to skate and have fun

name: Daphne Mcclain
text: This was my first time skating in over 20 years and I had a blast. The staff was great. I will definitely be back...soon.

name: Hunter Roberts
text: This is a nice place however the owner lady is not the nicest. They gave me terrible skates that didn't latch good and looked like they were bought at kmart 20 years ago. The skate floor is nice but with 200 people skating you can't move. Man on the loud speaker kept telling me skate slower. I didn't pay to skate slow. Guess ill give it another try since no other place is near.

name: Kayla Buckner
text: Always love this place! Been going there most of my life. Hasnt changed a bit. Jessie and I will be visiting again very soon! :)

name: Carma Burke
text: Great place for a birthday party.

text: The rules are too strict,  you can't go as fast as you want.  But...  It is a very nice place and I had fun.

name: Patrice Samuel
text: The lady at the front desk was rude to my daughter. She was there for my nephew bday party. I promise u I want stop until something is done. If you are racist u don't need to work in public places.

name: Lenny Ferguson
text: They throw a nice party for kids. Good music. Great staff.

name: Lanea Head
text: We went to Roller Motion for our cheerleading party a couple of weeks ago. We just chose Roller Motion because all of the kids around 9 to 16 years old seem to like to hang out there. It is a very clean well-kept place and I do trust them with my children there are police there to make sure that the children do not leave unless their parents come and get them and they are being watched if you decide to drop them off. I don't drop my children off I stay with them but if you do want to drop them off your children are being watched by the the staff. The only downside is that it is about 30 minutes away from my house. We need to open up a skating rink in Hueytown but Roller Motion is great actually I suppose I should say it's great for kids of all ages because I see little kids all the way to grandparents out there skating and dancing there's also games to play Arcade games and waste Skee-Ball to win tickets are hockey all that sort of stuff

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! Come join us again soon!

name: Todd Eaton
text: I love roller motion skate Center. The management is very welcoming and loving as well as staff.i love this place the food is awesome.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review. We are glad you had a great time! Come back again soon!

name: Lance Connery
text:
My girlfriend and her family recently went to this rink in hopes of a good time, but they were turned away. One of their sons, has cerebral palsy, and is confined to a wheelchair. He must use it in public, as it is the only way for him to get around. When he and his family attempted to enter the building for an evening of fun, they were told to leave and, in full and blatant violation of the Americans with Disabilities Act, the police were called and the family was removed by authorities. The ADA states in the following passage the illegality of this act. The woman who runs this "establishment" and her daughter were in full knowledge of their violation, as they indicated during the argument that took place at the rink. The outrage, astonishment, and hurt that my loved ones have suffered at the hands of these two heartless women is unforgivable. Nor is this the only violation. I have been told of numerous other handicapped people who have been turned away, and there have been several injuries due to unsafe conduct at the establishment. The two women are now eligible for a suit to be brought against them and their business to be shut down, but no action has been taken.

This documents the eligibility of the suit, and any other violations may fall under different legislation.

Under Title III, no individual may be discriminated against on the basis of disability with regards to the full and equal enjoyment of the goods, services, facilities, or accommodations of any place of public accommodation by any person who owns, leases (or leases to), or operates a place of public accommodation. "Public accommodations" include most places of lodging (such as inns and hotels), recreation, transportation, education, and dining, along with stores, care providers, and places of public displays, among other things.

name: Marcie Speakman Skinner
text: Great place for kids. Sherry, the owner is super nice, always has child's best interest at heart. She's  very approachable for kids and adults. If a problem arises, theres always a police officer there on Friday & Saturday nights. Great place for kids bday party too for about $125.00, includes table, pizza & drinks for up to 10 kids.

text: This is a great place. My only complaint is they have one cop, Davenport, who is rude to the children. He gets in their faces and yells at them and is really ugly. This is a lot of kids first experience with a police officer and I don't think it's good for it to be negative considering what's going on in our society right now.

name: Crystal Brophy
text:
Ok place to skate. Sometimes the owners are friendly sometimes not.
I really think ALL skating rinks should have a smaller skate floor for little ones to practice on because the little kids are out of control here.
They run into you, go the wrong way and are dangerous with the "skate helpers" (ramming you from behind).
I swear tonight, 2 little boys about 10 years old were intentionally ramming into people and NO one stopped them!
The skate floor is a bit waxy in some places as well.
Other than that way better than Skates 280.

name: Kim Juarez
text: My family loves this place. The people who work there are  awesome. A clean, fun, and safe place.

name: Latasha Tate
text: Great service awsome Groupon!  We wanted to have a family night and save money all at the same time. This was exactly what we needed!

name: Tilyn Stephens
text: First time going to roller motion and my last. The staff at the counter when you first come in attitude is bad. Second I don't carry cash and I didn't  know they didn't take debit cards.  And then on top of that the ATM on the inside was out of order. I was there with a cheerleader party and I had one extra which was $3.00. She took the ticket back from the child since I didn't have cash and the ATM was out of order. Then I said well she doesn't have to skate. She said its still $3.00 for her to even go in.   I didn't understand that being that you can't even get a pair of skates without the ticket showing you paid. And she didn't have any skates of her own.  I will never be back again.  Then on top off all that its a dump.

text: Posting under an anon account. Roller motion is highly fun and an amazing place. however, a lot of the more experienced skaters do not allow for lesser experienced skaters to learn as they are doing dangerous tricks and acting like fools. name: Lauren Blankenship
text: The people who work here are nice enough, but this place is pretty dumpy.  Be aware that they only take cash and if you need to run out to your car to get something, you have to take your skates off (even if they are your own pair).  They offer "walkers" with wheels for small kids who aren't good skaters, but they rent them out to older kids who can skate perfectly fine and are out there doing tricks with the walkers.  Meanwhile, smaller kids who are waiting to get one can't enjoy themselves.  When we finally got a walker, we were todl it woudl be another $7.  There were kids not wearing skates running out in front of skaters and kids going the wrong direction.  A good skater would have a hard time dodging all of this while not injuring themselves or the small kids.  It is also extremely loud.  The woman making announcements (that you cannot understand) talks over the music, which is already loud and hurting our ears.  We would not return to this skating rink.
